metadata.name: Surprise #1
metadata.description:
Surprise is a generative collection of one-hundred pieces permanently exhibited in an immersive experience, Surprise Land.

Each piece as been produced by an algorithm. The unique seed of each token drives a set of rules for cube subdivisions, animation and colors.

Surprise is an emotion you can feel when you discover something unexpected. This feeling has stuck with me ever since I started writing algorithms that produce visuals based on randomness, and I love it.

You can discover Surprise #1 in the Labyrinth  
https://oncyber.io/surpriseland-labyrinth

And also in the Museum  
https://oncyber.io/surpriseland-museum  

Or you can download the three-dimensional file  
https://gateway.pinata.cloud/ipfs/QmWibdRtQYScqaHU4yrxHcjxPeeNqMxNKku9GiekUZTwNG/1.glb
